member.name: T:WebPortal.Infrastructure.Caching.HybridCacheService
member.summary: Cache service backed by Redis (preferred) with an in-memory fallback. The portal uses cache for: - active catalog (Categories/Links) - user workspace (Favorites/Orders)

member.name: T:WebPortal.Infrastructure.Persistence.WebPortalDbContextFactory
member.summary: Design-time factory for EF Core migrations. Used by `dotnet ef` when a startup project is not available or to simplify tooling. Reads connection string from environment variable WEBPORTAL_DB or from appsettings in the startup project.
